Class AccountView

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractView<Account>
      • AccountView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAccountView, IObserver, IViewGUI

    public class AccountView
extends AbstractView<Account>
implements IAccountView, IViewGUI
    Implementation of the IAccountView interface. Requires a model that implements the IModelView interface.
